quote: Mind makes a man of God.
author: Emmanuel Diogu

quote: The mind is a metaphor of the world of objects.
author: Pierre Bourdieu

quote: Mind is a flexible mirror, adjust it, to see a better world.
author: Amit Ray,  Mindfulness : Living in the Moment - Living in the Breath

quote: It's all in the mind.
author: George Harrison

quote: the mind is a neural computer
author: Steven Pinker,  How the Mind Works

quote: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
author: Plato

quote: Never let anybody guess that you have a mind of your own. Above all be pure
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: IT’s All In The Game Of Mind.
author: Sujit Lalwani,  Life Simplified!

quote: My mind's my kingdom.
author: Francis Quarles

quote: What’s on my mind? I could say you, but we both know I'd be lying. Actually, I'm only pretending that you aren't on my mind. But I know that you don't mind.
author: Jarod Kintz,  The Days of Yay are Here! Wake Me Up When They're Over.

quote: A mind is like a puzzle; you must unlock it to read its hidden secrets.
author: Melissa de la Cruz,  Masquerade

quote: The mind is a powerful thing. It can take you through walls.
author: Denis Avey,  The Man Who Broke Into Auschwitz: A True Story of World War II

quote: Anymore, no one's mind is their own.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Lullaby

quote: The mind uses the power of thought to win the world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It is not enough to have a good mind. The main thing is to use it well.
author: René Descartes,  Discourse on Method

quote: Think, think, think.
author: A.A. Milne,  Winnie-the-Pooh

quote: The mind is a complex and many-layered thing, Potter... or at least, most minds are...
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: I will use my mind, not just my regular brain lobes.
author: Peter Bognanni,  The House of Tomorrow

quote: The mind creates those things that exist.
author: Terry Tempest Williams,  Pieces of White Shell

quote: It's the mind that sees, not eyes.
author: Toba Beta,  Master of Stupidity

quote: You could achieve nothing with wondered mind! you need to stop it!
author: Kunal Jajal

quote: Mind isn't as serious as my mind makes it out to be.
author: Eckhart Tolle,  A New Earth: Awakening to Your Life's Purpose

quote: there're times when i suspect that the mind has a mind of its own. it shows us pictures. pictures of the past and the might-one-day-be. this mind's mind exerts its own will, too, and has its own voice
author: David Mitchell,  The Thousand Autumns of Jacob de Zoet

quote: I think to think. Not to be thought-full, or to reach a point of wisdom or acquire a grace of knowledge. I think for the sensuality of thought.
author: Ilyas Kassam

quote: Great minds think alike because a greater Mind is thinking through them.
author: Criss Jami,  Diotima, Battery, Electric Personality

quote: You can change your mind, don't let your mind change you
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: Open your mind before your mouth
author: Aristophanes

quote: The mind is an instrument made up of universal consciousness, egocentric consciousness, societal consciousness, along with education, values, virtues, judgment and wisdom.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Questions open the mind; answers shut it down.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Which came first, the mind or the idea of the mind? Have you never wondered? They arrived together. The mind is an idea.
author: Bernard Beckett,  Genesis

quote: The mind is the mine of man, wherein he digs out good or evil.
author: Ogwo David Emenike,  The Fortune in Failing: Decoding the Message of Failure

quote: Unfathomable mind: now beacon, now sea.
author: Samuel Beckett,  Molloy, Malone Dies, The Unnamable

quote: There are some things your mind has been hiding from you.
author: Obert Skye,  Leven Thumps and the Gateway to Foo

quote: The only way somebody can have control over our mind is if we don’t have control over it.
author: Joseph Rain

quote: Whenever I think of something but can't think of what it was I was thinking of, I can't stop thinking until I think I'm thinking of it again. I think I think too much.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: Lose your mind and come to your senses.
author: Frederick Salomon Perls

quote: I will never claim to know what you are thinking. I only hope I am on your mind.
author: Amanda Mosher,  Better to be able to love than to be loveable

quote: Minds are like flowers, they only open when the time is right.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Be control of your mind.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: None but ourselves can free our minds.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Two minds with but a single thought, two hearts that beat as one.
author: Jasper Fforde,  First Among Sequels

quote: Your mind is your library of what you read.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: My heart knows what my mind only think it knows.
author: Noah Benshea,  Jacob the Baker: Gentle Wisdom For a Complicated World

quote: Great minds discuss ideas. Average minds discuss events. Small minds discuss people.
author: Henry Thomas Buckle

quote: The weaker mind reacts.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Your mind is the knife that cuts the continuum of space and time into neat slices of linear experience.
author: Deepak Chopra,  The Way of the Wizard: Twenty Spiritual Lessons for Creating the Life You Want

quote: Mind your mind, soon, you will mine from it.
author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: Any ideas, plan, or purpose may be placed in the mind through repetition of thought
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The mind is the strongest tool we have to help us secure the riches within the universe.
author: Stephen Richards,  Cosmic Ordering Guide

quote: The mind of man is capable of anything.
author: Joseph Conrad,  Heart of Darkness
